Package deusto.safebox.server.dao

Interface Dao<E,​K>

Type Parameters:
E - the type of the stored object
K - the type of the keys of the objects
All Known Subinterfaces:
ItemCollectionDao, UserDao
All Known Implementing Classes:
SqlItemCollectionDao, SqlUserDao
public interface Dao<E,​K>
Data access object (DAO). Provides an abstraction to a persistence mechanism.
See Also:
Data access object in Wikipedia

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.lang.Boolean> delete​(E e)
    Deletes the given object from the storage system asynchronously.
    java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.util.Optional<E>> get​(K key)
    Returns a CompletableFuture<Optional<E>> that is completed successfully with an Optional containing the object associated to the specified key or an empty Optional if there is no object associated to the key.
    java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.util.List<E>> getAll()
    Returns a CompletableFuture<List<E>> that is completed successfully with a list with all the stored objects.
    java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.lang.Boolean> insert​(E e)
    Inserts the given object into the storage system asynchronously.
    java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.lang.Boolean> update​(E e)
    Updates the given object on the storage system asynchronously.

  • Method Details

    • insert

      java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.lang.Boolean> insert​(E e)
      Inserts the given object into the storage system asynchronously.

      The returned CompletableFuture completes with a Boolean that is true if and only if the insertion is performed successfully.

      Parameters:
      e - the object
      Returns:
      a CompletableFuture<Boolean>

    • update

      java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.lang.Boolean> update​(E e)
      Updates the given object on the storage system asynchronously.

      The returned CompletableFuture completes with a Boolean that is true if and only if the update is performed successfully.

      Parameters:
      e - the object
      Returns:
      a CompletableFuture<Boolean>

    • delete

      java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.lang.Boolean> delete​(E e)
      Deletes the given object from the storage system asynchronously.

      The returned CompletableFuture completes with a Boolean that is true if and only if the deletion is performed successfully.

      Parameters:
      e - the object
      Returns:
      a CompletableFuture<Boolean>

    • get

      java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.util.Optional<E>> get​(K key)
      Returns a CompletableFuture<Optional<E>> that is completed successfully with an Optional containing the object associated to the specified key or an empty Optional if there is no object associated to the key.

      The returned CompletableFuture completes exceptionally with DaoException if an error occurs when getting the object from the storage system.

      Parameters:
      key - the key whose associated object is to be returned
      Returns:
      an Optional with the object associated to the specified key or an empty Optional if there is no object associated to the key

    • getAll

      java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.util.List<E>> getAll()
      Returns a CompletableFuture<List<E>> that is completed successfully with a list with all the stored objects.

      The returned CompletableFuture completes exceptionally with DaoException if an error occurs when getting the list of objects from the storage system.

      Returns:
      a CompletableFuture<List<E>>
